trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a binding system or another schema representation system for XAML reports an exception to the schema context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定系统或 xaml 的另一个架构表示系统报告到的架构上下文异常时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The XamlSchemaException is thrown by several cases in the CLR binding support classes that provide the schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>).
trans-unit.target: 由几种情况，在为.NET Framework XAML 服务提供的架构上下文的 CLR 绑定支持类引发 XamlSchemaException (<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>)。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>

trans-unit.source: A XamlSchemaException is typically passed as the inner exception for other exceptions, such as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-true property for a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterException>, so it should be uncommon to catch a XamlSchemaException directly unless you are implementing a component such as a specialized object writer.
trans-unit.target: XamlSchemaException 通常将作为内部异常的其他异常，如<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-true 属性<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterException>，因此它应为常见直接捕获 XamlSchemaException，除非你要实现等专用的对象编写器组件。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterException> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.IsUnknown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref>使用系统提供的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref>使用指定的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlSchemaException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
